verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MNR: abruptly] [V: announced] [ARG1: plans for the creation of a separate “ Space Force ” branch of the military on Monday] – [ARGM-ADV: despite the fact the U.S. has been reliant on Russia to send astronauts into space for years] .

President Donald Trump abruptly announced plans for the creation of a separate “ Space Force ” branch of the military on Monday – despite the fact the U.S. [V: has] been reliant on Russia to send astronauts into space for years .

President Donald Trump abruptly announced plans for the creation of a separate “ Space Force ” branch of the military on Monday – despite the fact [ARG1: the U.S.] has [V: been] [ARG2: reliant on Russia to send astronauts into space for years] .

President Donald Trump abruptly announced plans for the creation of a separate “ Space Force ” branch of the military on Monday – despite the fact the U.S. has been reliant on [ARG0: Russia] to [V: send] [ARG1: astronauts] [ARG2: into space] [ARGM-TMP: for years] .
